title: Past & Present Collide
description: Kylie loves Derek but lately she has been questioning whether or not she can marry him. Their wedding is four months away and the closer it becomes the more unsure and confused she grows. When she discovers he brought an old house her curiosity gets the better of her and she wants to see it. There she discovers the former owners shared a similar situation to hers and Derek's. Through their letters she begins traveling down the path to make the ultimate decision. Can she marry Derek?
author: Amanda Kay
